midstSfxId.Wiki: ID of ffx to use while effect is active

midstSeId.Wiki: ID of sound to use while effect is active

initSfxId.Wiki: ID of ffx to use when effect is first added

initSeId.Wiki: ID of sound to use when effect is first added

finishSfxId.Wiki: ID of ffx to use when effect is removed

finishSeId.Wiki: ID of sound to use when effect is removed

midstDmyId.Wiki: ID of DummyPoly to use for while effect is active FFX

initDmyId.Wiki: ID of DummyPoly to use for when effect is first added FFX

finishDmyId.Wiki: ID of DummyPoly to use for when effect is removed FFX

isInvisibleWeapon.Wiki: Makes right weapon invisible (hidden weapon sorcery)

isSilence.Wiki: Makes effect owner produce no sound (Hush sorcery, Slumbering Dragoncrest Ring)
